description: The xzibit_datasets_copy dataset is designed to manage and describe various data projects, providing detailed metadata and access information. It includes unique identifiers for each project and dataset, as well as information about the data source, format, and storage. This dataset is particularly useful for data engineers and project managers who need to keep track of multiple datasets across different projects. It provides insights into the management status, connection details, and access modes, which are crucial for maintaining data integrity and accessibility. Additionally, it includes metadata such as the last modification details, which help in auditing and version control. The dataset also supports HR analytics by offering detailed descriptions of datasets related to employee attrition and sentiment analysis, making it valuable for organizations aiming to improve employee retention and satisfaction. Overall, this dataset serves as a comprehensive tool for managing data projects, ensuring efficient data handling and facilitating strategic decision-making.
shortDesc: Dataset for managing data projects with metadata and access details.

columns.name: projectKey
columns.comment: Unique identifier for each data project.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Unique identifier for the dataset.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Name of the dataset within the project.

columns.name: exists
columns.comment: Indicates if the dataset exists.

columns.name: type
columns.comment: Type of data source or storage used.

columns.name: formatType
columns.comment: File format of the dataset, e.g., csv, avro.

columns.name: params.connection
columns.comment: Connection details for data access.

columns.name: managed
columns.comment: Indicates if the dataset is managed.

columns.name: params.mode
columns.comment: Mode of data access or operation.

columns.name: params.table
columns.comment: Table name pattern within the project.

columns.name: params.schema
columns.comment: Schema details for the dataset.

columns.name: params.path
columns.comment: File path pattern for dataset storage.

columns.name: creationTag.lastModifiedBy.login
columns.comment: Email of the last person who modified the dataset.

columns.name: creationTag.lastModifiedOn
columns.comment: Timestamp of the last modification.

columns.name: versionTag.lastModifiedBy.login
columns.comment: Email of the last person who modified the version.

columns.name: versionTag.lastModifiedOn
columns.comment: Timestamp of the last version modification.

columns.name: shortDesc
columns.comment: Brief description of the dataset's content.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Detailed description of the dataset's purpose and features.

columns.name: params.metastoreDatabaseName
columns.comment: Name of the metastore database used.

columns.name: params.folderSmartId
columns.comment: Smart ID for folder management.

columns.name: tags
columns.comment: Tags associated with the dataset.

columns.name: featureGroup
columns.comment: Indicates if the dataset is a feature group.

columns.name: num_metrics_checks
columns.comment: Number of metric checks performed.

columns.name: num_columns
columns.comment: Number of columns in the dataset.

columns.name: column_names
columns.comment: List of column names in the dataset.
